OOC:  Dewboy, if I can quote the awesome Chris Jericho who is only cool as a
heel:  WOULD YOU PLEASE, SHUT, THE HELL, UP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  You're ideas
could be worth considering, but the considering would be pointless because
you're ideas suck.  You think you're ideas are great and that you're
awesome, well guess what?  You act like an immature 13-year old or
something, because all you do is rant and rave and say stuff and continue to
get on my nerves!  Man, if there wasn't any of those weird "nice-guys" such
as rauq on the council, but instead me, you would soooooo have your ass
kicked!  And now, the council is either going to act like the Corporate
idiots called the McMahons and start lecturing me on how I shouldn't swear
and crap and say the truth by saying your ideas suck, and/or you're going to
reply to this with your monotonous whining...

From: "Kyle Stewart" <dewboy30816@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, April 21, 2002 5:57 PM
Subject: Re: Poll results for nbwrpg


> (mindless rant in 3....2...1...) DID YOU NOT READ IT
> OR ARE YOU JUST TO STUPID TO UNDERSTAND IT!  GOOD
> RPING WOULD EARN MORE POINTS THAN WINNING BATTLES (I
> noted making a char successfully act messed up in da'
> head would get more points than winning a fight)
> WINNING BATTLES WOULDN'T GET YOU NEARLY AS MANY POINTS
> YOU MORON!
>
> --- Rudra656@... wrote:
> > a) impractical
> > b) unfair
> >
> > It's not as simple as scoring a fight, for one thing
> > someone would have to
> > keep track of it and that person would have to be
> > impartial.  No one here is
> > impartial.
> >

> >
> > Now if you want to fix these problems and resubmit
